word: G5594 - ψύχω - psýchō - psoo'-kho - Wax cold

sections.paragraph: to breathe, blow, cool by blowing

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primary verb; to breathe (voluntarily but gently; thus differing on the one hand from G4154, which denotes properly a forcible respiration; and on the other from the base of G109, which refers properly to an inanimate breeze), that is, (by implication of reduction of temperature by evaporation) to chill (figuratively): - wax cold.
